One sometimes subconscious decision-making
strategy is risk aversion.
Risks are risky.

Our skew toward stability and away from riskiness

People have a tendency to think of an outcome

might happen.

For example, if Jamal will definitely give

And this is called the isolation effect.

It’s when you ignore what the things you’re
